Clydestone Ghana bụ ụlọ ọrụ ozi na teknụzụ nkwukọrịta Ghana
Edepụtara ha na ndepụta ngwaahịa nke Ghana Stock Exchange, GSE All-Share Index

Emebere na June 1989, na-arụ ọrụ na Mpaghara nke Sistemụ Ịkwụ Ụgwọ - Lelee Truncation na ACH Systems, G-switch (Global Switch) ụlọ ọrụ na-ahazi azụmahịa, G-chekwaa onye na-ewepụta na onye nweta nkwenye maka Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Union Pay,mba ụwa.
